{{Infobox tvseason | image = | season_name = Casualty'' Series 18 | show_name = ''[[Casualty (TV series)|Casualty]]'' | bgcolour = #666600 | fgcolour = #ffffff | dvd_release_date = Unknown | country = [[United Kingdom]] | network = [[BBC]] | first_aired = {{Start date|2003|9|13|df=y}} | last_aired = {{End date|2004|8|28|df=y}} | num_episodes = 46 | prev_series = [[Casualty (series 17)|17]] | next_series = [[Casualty (series 19)|19]] }} The eighteenth series of the [[United Kingdom|British]] [[medical drama]] [[television series]] ''[[Casualty (TV series)|Casualty]]'' commenced airing in the United Kingdom on BBC One on 13 September 2003 and finished on 28 August 2004. [http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0096555/episodes#season-18 IMDB Casualty Series 18] It saw another increase, this time to 46 episodes.

==Cast== *[[Derek Thompson (actor)|Derek Thompson]] as Charlie Fairhead (Episodes 1-40) *[[Simon MacCorkindale]] as Harry Harper *[[Maxwell Caulfield]] as Jim Brodie (Episode 2 onwards) *[[Christine Stephen-Daly]] as Lara Stone (Episodes 1-46) *[[Christopher Colquhoun]] as Simon Kaminski (Episodes 1-46) *[[Ian Bleasdale]] as Josh Griffiths *[[Kwame Kwei-Armah]] as Finlay "Fin" Newton *[[Martina Laird]] as Comfort Jones *[[Matthew Wait]] as Luke Warren *[[Kelly Harrison]] as Nikki Marshall (Episodes 1-40) *[[Suzanne Packer]] as Tess Bateman (Episode 1 onwards) *[[Loo Brealey]] as Roxanne Bird *[[Leanne Wilson]] as Claire Guildford (Episode 3 onwards) *[[Holly Davidson]] as Tally Harper (Episodes 1-34) *[[Sarah Manners]] as Rebecca "Bex" Reynolds *[[James Redmond (actor)|James Redmond]] as John "Abs" Denham (Episode 5 onwards) *[[Rebekah Gibbs]] as Nina Farr (Episode 41 onwards) *[[Zita Sattar]] as Anna Paul (Episodes 1-3) *[[Sebastian Dunn]] as Merlin Jameson (Episodes 1-3) *[[Julia Watson]] as Baz Wilder (Episodes 12-19) ==Notable Guest Characters== *[[Louis Emerick]] as Mike Bateman (Episode 1 onwards) *[[Kristian Wilkin]] as Andy Brodie *[[Nigel Whitmey]] as Dan Wilder *[[Liam Hess]] as Louis Fairhead *[[Frank Windsor]] as Kenneth Samuels *[[Peter Ash]] as Keith Jowell *[[Julia Hills]] as Caroline Miller ==Episodes== {{Main|List of Casualty episodes}} {| class="wikitable" style="width:100%;" |- !
